attributes.action: Pay carers over 65 a full pension regardless of contributions and allow transfer of the carers unused personal tax allowance to the disabled spouse.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many long term carers carry on caring after retirement age.  Because they have given up work to care they end up with reduced pensions and lose their carers allowance as well.  They rarely use all the their personal tax allowance as a result.  Surely some of the money they are saving the NHS/Government could be passed back as suggested.
